document_name: Report to Kyrgyz Government on the Implementation of the Project
Report to Kyrgyz Government on the Implementation of the Project
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/KGZ/Project Activity Report UNDP KGZ RoL_ 4Q - final.docx

outputs.output_descr: The "Enhancing Democratic Rule of Law to promote peace and stability in the Kyrgyz Republic" (UNDP Kyrgyzstan Rule of Law Programme) is a comprehensive rule of law programme designed to consolidate a number of different projects being implemented by UNDP Kyrgyzstan as of mid-2012 and provide new outputs and mechanisms of coordination. The primary focus of the "Enhancing Democratic Rule of Law to promote peace and stability in the Kyrgyz Republic" Programme is to assist national Rule of Law actors in the efforts to  better implement laws, conduct oversight of government and security services, combat corruption, provide service delivery and security and afford citizens and most vulnerable groups with access to justice, community security and empowerment.

project_descr: Enhancing the Democratic Rule of Law to promote peace and stability
project_title: Enhancing the Democratic Rule of Law
